TSVReaderÂ¶

TSVReader reads graphs:

filename = '../../resources/sample.tsv'
reader = TSVReader(filename, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8)

# read the next graph
graph = reader.next()
print(str(graph)+'\n')

# read the rest
for graph in reader:
    print(str(graph)+'\n')
